column4: can someone help me with my messed up xorg.conf? I'm on a Lenovo T61 and got problems after upgrading 8.04->8.10
the screen goes blank on reboot
vivierfs and then ctrl + alt + f7 to get back, right?
or go to the recovery are and use the Fix xserver (or something similar) option
thank you, i've got some more now - the problem is in the nvidia driver. now if I only new which nvidia driver to re-install, I'd be really happy
what card?
dunno, how do I find out?
what does lspci | grep -e vga say?
ah, that says nothing as I'm in failsafe without nvidia right now. That's the only way to get X up :(
it will still say something even if you are in failsafe
sorry correction lspci | grep VGA
much better - 01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation Quadro NVS 140M (rev a1)
ooh thats an odd looking one, gimme a sec
thank you!
http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/NVidia_Quadro_NVS_140m ?
not really sure what it's telling me though
gimme a sec :)
ok :)
sure, according to there you can either use the NV (opensource driver) or the NVIDIA (propriatery driver)
if you go for nvidia you will want the -177 one
thank you so much!
